title: You acquire your fav champion's passive
body:
What's the outcome?

{{champion:14}} 
Hmm...
If I die I can go on a murderous rampage that never ends as long as there are victims...


Ehh....

replies.body:
{{champion:120}}  I can walk through units.
Oh wait..

You hit harder the faster you're moving.

Congrats, you gained basic physics.
INERTIA MOTHERFUCKER!
Sir Isaac Newton is the deadliest son of a bitch in space.

{{champion:223}} I need to lick my food 3 times before i can actually eat it

help me pls
Well you can swallow the food whole though, that's a plus
But he can't taste it D:
You can taste it with licks.

{{champion:96}}  I can see it now.

I'm just lying in my death bed surrounded by my loved ones, seeing them one last time as my last breath passes through my lips.

Then suddenly, I let out a bloodcurdling scream and chase everyone in the room until I explode with immense force.

{{champion:90}} 
If i ever learn how to cast spells i can give people crabs
You don't need to cast spells to do that.
ಠ‿ಠ

{{champion:420}} Tentacles constantly spawn on surfaces around me.

Complications will be had.
But ya'll get the ladies~

{{champion:432}}  
I pick  up random junk on the side-walk, and get to have Miyazaki-style Spirit friends in exchange ... *awesome*.
{{champion:62}} *looks at passive* can we trade :(
Well then you'll be invincible when fighting armies

>_Passive_: Gains 4/6/8 armor and **magic resist** for every near by enemy

I don't want to ruin magic shows with my magic resist though T_T
Rip magic trick conventions
{{champion:133}} : A bird flies down and tells me where I should hit someone to make them really feel it.
Far more importantly: You get a bird with no maintenance requirements.
{{champion:27}} Literally jackshit.

{{champion:82}} 
If I kick someone in the jewels I won't have to fear his wrath and simply grin while he punches me back

Jewels?
...

{{champion:44}}  GEMS!!
{{champion:107}} i can jump out of bushes for SURPRISEBUTTSEX

{{champion:17}} 
I'll be in the girls' changing room.
Lucky. I only have this power when I'm around bartenders.

{{champion:432}} I abandon those who most need me in order to collect windchimes. Hundreds of windchimes. When my family and freinds stage an intervention, I throw my imaginary freinds at them, who proceed to explode before being replaced.

{{champion:412}} 
I can explain why I'm collecting souls.
Wait.
No I can't.

{{champion:4}}  I'm rich ! but at what cost?

{{champion:34}}  awkward or should i say cawkward?....
{{champion:34}} As long as you don't die twice within a few minutes you're immortal
{{champion:106}} When im about to die I dont.

{{champion:90}}  yea i have new pet i will 
love him 
and pet him
and take care of him
and call him George
http://giphy.com/gifs/PtEZTzZywiWd2
.....21 sec later 
oh NO he's dead T.T
{{champion:111}} I break people's ankles by smashing them on the head.
{{champion:30}} I turn into an annoying spirit when i die. Oh wait I'm already like that alive.

{{champion:41}} My sword becomes searing hot every 15 seconds! But I don't have a sword

(Looks down at hands)

HayRoss has learned fire punch
{{champion:150}} heheheheheheh. MWUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHA

{{champion:62}} I gain Armor and MR for every enemy near me...
I see how the armor could be useful, but does the MR mean that I'm just not affected by magic tricks?

**Magician**: watch as I pull a rabbit out of my hat!
**Me**: There is a hidden compartment at the bottom of the hat -__-
**Magician**: ...
{{champion:102}}  I get extra armor and mr, okay cool? It's doubled when in dragon form? Well... how do I turn into dragon?

Braum-Punching people repeatedly makes them freeze, pretty usefull in fights
Raka-You can run faster towards ppl who are injured, could be usefull in certain jobs
Talon- If someone is on the ground, your kicks against them are extra strong, meh
Lissandra-Useless I think
Graves-Basically you get destiny, a shotgun with infinite ammo but only shoots a few meters in distance
Trundle- when somebody dies near you, you feel better. (you might want to work at pest control or something lik ethat)
{{champion:432}}  I gain movement speed and little yellow people follow me around if I collect tampons O_O

Time to teach villains a thing or two about JUSTICE! (Yes, I used his ult's passive. No, it is not cheating if the passive is that just). 
http://i.giflike.com/ph5FKPA.gif
